mapper.select: SELECT id, symbol, analysis_time, recommended_position, confidence_score, moving_average, rsi_value, macd_value, volatility, funding_rate, trade_volume, created_at FROM chart_analysis_predictions WHERE symbol = #{symbol} ORDER BY analysis_time DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chart_analysis_predictions (symbol, analysis_time, recommended_position, confidence_score, moving_average, rsi_value, macd_value, volatility, funding_rate, trade_volume, reason, created_at) VALUES (#{symbol}, #{analysisTime}, #{recommendedPosition}, #{confidenceScore}, #{movingAverage}, #{rsiValue}, #{macdValue}, #{volatility}, #{fundingRate}, #{reason}, #{tradeVolume}, NOW());
